scripts.check-db: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { pool } = require('./config/db'); (async () => { try { const client = await pool.connect(); console.log('‚úÖ Connected to database:', process.env.DB_DATABASE || process.env.DB_NAME); const tables = await client.query(\"SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'public'\"); console.log('üìã Tables:', tables.rows.map(r => r.table_name)); if (tables.rows.find(r => r.table_name === 'users')) { const users = await client.query('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users'); console.log('üë• Users:', users.rows[0].count); } if (tables.rows.find(r => r.table_name === 'transactions')) { const transactions = await client.query('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions'); console.log('üí∞ Transactions:', transactions.rows[0].count); } if (tables.rows.find(r => r.table_name === 'anomalies')) { const anomalies = await client.query('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM anomalies'); console.log('üö® Anomalies:', anomalies.rows[0].count); } client.release(); process.exit(0); } catch(e) { console.error('‚ùå Error:', e.message); process.exit(1); } })();"
